bibl.title: Jewish Inscriptions and Jewish Literature in Egypt, with Special Reference to Ecclesiasticus.

series.title: Arbeiten zur Geschichte des antiken Judentums und des Urchristentums.

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Language and Style. - 3. Epigraphic Themes in Ecclesiasticus: a. Encomium; - b. Lamentation; - c. Consolation and Death.
HORBURY William, Jewish Inscriptions and Jewish Literature in Egypt, with Special Reference to Ecclesiasticus.
Jan Willem VAN HENTEN and Pieter Willem VAN DER HORST (Edd.), Studies in Early Jewish Epigraphy = Arbeiten zur Geschichte des antiken Judentums und des Urchristentums. 21 (Leiden, 1994) pp. 9-43.
